titleStmt.title: An allarm to the inhabitants of the earth that they all may be awakned [sic] and shake off their poluted garments, and meet the Lord with speedy repentance ... and here is a warning to all rulers, magistrates, and men in authority, that they all do that which is just and right ... also a salutation to the children of Light, who are turned to the Lord especially to them in Dorcet shire / by T.W.
titleStmt.author: T. W. (Thomas Woodrove)

titleStmt.title: An allarm to the inhabitants of the earth that they all may be awakned [sic] and shake off their poluted garments, and meet the Lord with speedy repentance ... and here is a warning to all rulers, magistrates, and men in authority, that they all do that which is just and right ... also a salutation to the children of Light, who are turned to the Lord especially to them in Dorcet shire / by T.W.
titleStmt.author: T. W. (Thomas Woodrove)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed in the 3d. month for M.W.,

notesStmt.note: Signed on p. 8: Written in the 3d. month 1659. T.W.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England)
